s1.ptxt: Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining:M16A and J20A .
Remove intake manifold referring to Intake Manifold Removal and Installation:M16A .
Disconnect water inlet hose (1) and heater outlet No.2 hose (2) from each pipe.
Remove thermostat case (3) with thermostat cap (4).
Remove thermostat cap (4) from thermostat case (3).

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following points.

item.ptxt: When positioning thermostat (1) on thermostat case (2), be sure to position it so that air bleed valve (3) comes at position as shown in the figure.
Refill cooling system referring to Step 7) to 17) of Cooling System Flush and Refill:M16A and J20A .
Verify that there is no coolant leakage at each connection.
